name: SevenElevenPanic-GWJ32
description:
Serve angry customers in a 711 in Panic. You can also customize your character.

Game is available on all platforms as well as in the web browser.

Controls: 

Gamepad/Keyboard:

  • Move with left  control stick/Arrow keys
  • Cross (down button) for action/Z
  • Square (left button) to dash/X
  • Start button to pause/Escape

Attributions:

Featuring Music by Matthew Pablo: http://www.matthewpablo.com

Some sound effect from : https://www.kenney.nl

All 3d/2d assets made by me.
